verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I find that I'm safe and warm
In your loving arms

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I find that I'm safe and warm
In your loving arms

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You see me
And You know me
And You love me
Through and through

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You see me
And You know me
And You love me
Through and through

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
You see me
And You know me
And You love me
Through and through
